MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA14 area of Port Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:31pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Marloch Avenue substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:55pm on Sunday, 25 October 2020
